description:
Things We Can’t Live Without: Under $20 edition


Welcome to mini episodes! Two products every week. This week, Caroline and mini co-host Jackie J. discuss the numero uno item for under $20 they can’t live without. Picture frames that don’t break the bank and Scrub Daddy. Also, Hamilton…?


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Inexpensive Picture Frames: https://amzn.to/3eHUK2b
  • Scrub Daddy: https://amzn.to/3eHG8Q9
  • Listen to our Natch Beaut Minis!: https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly9yc3MuYWNhc3QuY29tL25hdGNoLWJlYXV0/episode/YzhhZmY3MGItNjBlZS00ODRmLTgxZTYtOTA1MTE2ZDg4NTc0?hl=en&ved=2ahUKEwi68dbc3rPvAhXnt1kKHTqeALQQieUEegQIFRAI&ep=6 


Top 8 Best Selling Products in the Gee Thanks! Community in 2020!


8. The Hot Tub ($529): https://amzn.to/3aYP1TO

7. Digit for saving: https://digit.co/r/GeeThanks?ab

6. Rakuten for cash back while you shop: https://www.rakuten.com/r/CAROLI33174?eeid=28187

5. Universal Standard: https://fave.co/3l5KtN7

4. LED Lights: https://amzn.to/2WZO9WG

3. Home Comforts: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780743272865

2. The Revlon One Step: https://amzn.to/3o96cFO

Annnnd: 1. The Garden Witch Overalls (Size up!): https://amzn.to/383oGlt


Visit www.geethanksjustboughtit.com for even more recs and shop the Gee Thanks! Store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit
